response.summary: Cybersecurity expert with a strong background in Endpoint Security, Network Security, and Cloud Security. Possesses comprehensive knowledge of networking and operating systems. Successfully implemented, configured, and provided support for cutting-edge security solutions across Latin American enterprises, including renowned companies such as Ecopetrol, Belcorp, and Banco Agrario de Colombia. Enthusiastic about collaborative teamwork and empowering clients. Fluent in multiple languages: Spanish (native), English (full proficiency), and currently advancing proficiency in French through the Quebec Francisation program.
response.skills: Cloud Security, Python (Programming Language), Firewalls, Cybersecurity, Network Security, Information Security, Technical Support, Databases, Programming, Java

profile_positions.description:
As an Implementation and Support Engineer at Telefonica I had the following responsibilities:

* Install, set up, manage, and support firewalls, antimalware and DLP consoles/agents.
* Remove malware and other threats from laptops, desktop systems and servers.
* Performed root cause analysis and general troubleshooting.
* Lead the Implementation team.
profile_positions.title: IMPLEMENTATION AND SUPPORT ENGINEER

profile_positions.description:
* Installing, configuring, managing, and maintaining antimalware consoles/agents.
* Removed malware, ransomware and other threats from laptops, desktop systems and servers.
* Performed root cause analysis and general troubleshooting.
profile_positions.title: Support Engineer
